main.name: Siya Narang
main.occupation: Computer Science with specialisation in Bioinformatics
main.description: I am a 20-year old coding enthusiast with proficient knowledge of web development, Graphic designing along with a bit of experience in UI/UX Designing
main.bio: Highly organized and innovative thinker with enhanced problem solving skills. Experienced in designing, implementing and testing various softwares. Serverd in many team projects and looking for a workspace to grow more.
main.contactmessage: Here are my details so you can easily get in touch with me

resume.skillmessage: I love to gain knowledge in every sector so here is an insight on what I have learnt so far

education.degree: BTech in Computer Science with specialization in Bioinformatics
education.description: Laernt various computer languages and subjects like Data Structure and Algorithms, Macine Learning, Artificial Intelligence etc. Currently a part of various clubs and experienced great exposure.
Scored 93% in Boards. Was a part of student council for two continuous years.

work.title: Design Program
work.description: A one month Design Bootcamp that develops in us design thinking fundamentals. We worked on basics of canva, Photoshop, Fifma and then on a group project as well as an individual one where we had to design a music cover for an album. Aloso recieved a certificate along with a letter of recommendation

work.title: Deep learning
work.description: It was an internship program on Deep Learning with computer vision where we first enhanced our skills on python by doing various assignments and then worked on real world problems by implementing artificial inteeligence and deep learning algorithms.

work.title: GUI and Website Developer
work.description: A student funded rocketry team that participates annually in two internation competitions. Developed GUI applications for this purpose using PyQt5. Also worked on the Team's website.

work.title: Finance and Technical head
work.description: VIT's only multimedia club where we enhance our communication skills as well as our designing ability. Currently working on it's website

testimonials.text: That Siya has shown commendable skills in developing spectacular skills and that she was confident of her exceptional skills and personal qualities. He also said that she made a powerful asset and also demonstrated best of her dilligence and dedication.
That she was always eager to learn new areas of problem-solving and did an excellent jon in completing all the allotted tasks and was always one of the most determined members of the group
